subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Olympic Games (2008)
Air Pollution
lead_paragraph: Spain’s Samuel Sanchez won gold Saturday at the men’s cycling road race, an event where athletes in the Beijing Games had to confront the area’s notorious pollution in an endurance event.
snippet: Spain’s Samuel Sanchez won gold Saturday at the men’s cycling road race, an event where athletes in the Beijing Games had to confront the area’s notorious pollution in an endurance event.
